name: X-Class Threat
description:
"You are a super-powered individual. You can break the laws of physics.  You can perform miracles. You can change the world. You cannot win this fight."

‘X-Class Threat’ is a tabletop roleplaying game about being a superhero facing down a kaiju.  It is not about punching monsters, it is about saving people from a threat beyond your scope.

This game uses tarot cards as well as standard playing cards. This download includes both the Core Rulebook and the "Tyrant Protocols" Scenario Book.

This game was made for Kaijujam 2.
